title: Lei lal puan ropui chu a tlawm ang
lyrics:
Lei lal puan ropui chu a tlawm ang,
Lei pangpar mawite pawh a chuai th ei;
Kan dam lai ni pawh i a lo la tla ngei ang,
Mahse, Lal duhawm Isua ka nei.

Lili par mawi - Lal Isua ka nei,
Ka tan a par chatuan ram mawiah;
Hrehawmah pawh aman min awmpui fo va,
Lili par mawi - Lal Isua ka nei.

A hmangaihna ram eng mawiah khian,
Amah chu chatuan Varparh a ni;
Hrehawm tuar ila, hemi khawvelah hian,
A ramah chuan min la hruai dawn si.

Tunah tapin rum rih mah ila,
Thihnain ka mit a chhin hunin;
Ka hlau lovang, thlan thim ata min tho vang a,
Ka mittuite chu hru fai turin.

Kan thian duhten he khawvelah hian,
Min kalsanin ka rilru a ngui;
Mahse ka lungngai lo, mala ka lo awm hian,
Lili par mawi - Isuan min awmpui.
